EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to the customer when the ROT has been accepted
EmailTemplate.name: Final checks completed by Al Rayan Bank
EmailTemplate.subject: Al Rayan Bank property finance application update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Salutation} {!Account.FirstName} {!Account.LastName},
Please find below an update on the progress of your application for property finance from Al Rayan Bank.
We are pleased to confirm that having received and checked the information your solicitors provided, the Report on Title has been approved.
Subject to any Special Conditions relevant to your offer, we would release the funds.
If you have already provided your solicitor with a completion date, we will release the funds on this date.
If, however, you have not yet confirmed your preferred date of completion, we would be grateful if you could contact your solicitor to confirm your completion date, and ensure that your solicitor advises our solicitor of your preferred date.
Should you become aware of any issues which might affect your preferred completion date, please do not hesitate to contact our Sales Support team on 0121 456 7878, between 9.00am and 5.30pm, Monday to Friday.
Kind regards
Al Rayan Bank
